alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 11:47AM CST until March 07 at 2:15AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. Bourbeuse River at Union. Big River at Byrnesville. Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River at Valley Park. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big River at Byrnesville. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, South Byrnesville Road goes under water near this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:31 AM CST Sunday the stage was 19.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:31 AM CST Sunday was 19.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Big River Byrnesville 16.0 19.6 13.5 8.4 6.7 6.1 5.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
